resources.string: Unlocks the ability to purchase your first house.
Unlocks the ability to purchase your second house.
Unlocks the ability to purchase your third house.
Unlocks the ability to duel other players.
Unlocks the ability to participate in Invasions.
Unlocks the ability to participate in Outpost Rush.
Unlocks the ability to participate in 3v3 Arenas.

Unlocks Expertise. Expertise is a measure of the potential power of your item drops. Drops from creatures and areas that are level 60+ have a chance to increase this value. The more powerful the creature or area, the more likely you will see an increase.

Unlocks "Reignition" quest, which grants an Azoth Staff Tier 1 (upon completion). An Azoth staff is used to close Level 25 Corruption Breaches.\n\nNote: You must complete the preceding Main Story quests before undertaking this quest.

Unlocks "The Curse of Caer Dun" quest, which grants an Azoth Staff Tier 2 (upon completion). An Azoth staff is used to close Level 35 Corruption Breaches.\n\nNote: You must complete the preceding Main Story quests before undertaking this quest.

Unlocks "Corruption Spreads its Hooks" quest, which grants an Azoth Staff Tier 3 (upon completion). An Azoth staff is used to close Level 45 Corruption Breaches.\n\nNote: You must complete the preceding Main Story quests before undertaking this quest.

Unlocks "Race for the Box" quest, which grants an Azoth Staff Tier 4 (upon completion). An Azoth staff is used to close Level 55 Corruption Breaches.\n\nNote: You must complete the preceding Main Story quests before undertaking this quest.

Unlocks "Fortress at the Threshold" quest, which grants an Azoth Staff Tier 5 (upon completion). An Azoth staff is used to close Level 60 and 65+ Corruption Breaches.\n\nNote: You must complete the preceding Main Story quests before undertaking this quest.
Reekwater, Shattered Mountain, Brimstone Sands, Elysian Wilds
Unlocks the reward track in the season pass.
Unlocks the journey in the season pass.
Unlocks "My Kingdom for a Horse" quest, which grants the ability to summon a Horse mount.\n\nRequires Rise of the Angry Earth
Unlocks the ability to equip Artifacts.
